channel.title: Donator Points
channel.description: Hi guys, I have my donator shop all set up. But I'm having problems actually getting the donator points to work. I made it so I have 10000 donator points, but when I go to the shop (yes I made myself donator) and try to buy an item, it tells me I don't have enough points to purchase the item. I'm confused. I'm also using a PI. If anybody could give me some help that would be great!

item.title: Donator Points
item.dc:creator: @Pandora7 Pandora7
item.description:
@Pandora7 wrote:

did you check shop assistant?

Read full topic
